snippet: Mr. O’Connell helped devise the model for “no fault” auto insurance to protect traffic accident victims, lower car insurance rates and curb ambulance-chasing lawyers.
abstract: Jeffrey O’Connell, legal scholar who helped devise the model for 'no fault' auto insurance, dies at age 84.
lead_paragraph: Mr. O’Connell helped devise the model for “no fault” auto insurance to protect traffic accident victims, lower car insurance rates and curb ambulance-chasing lawyers.

headline.seo: Jeffrey O’Connell, Legal Scholar of No-Fault Coverage, Dies at 84
headline.main: Jeffrey O’Connell, Legal Scholar of No-Fault Coverage, Dies at 84
headline.print_headline: Jeffrey O’Connell, Pioneer of Auto Insurance Law, Dies at 84
